title: State v. Gary Mitchum Reeves – Episode 5 – Henry
description:
August 14, 2017 / In November 1980, Henry Ridley Jr. was shot and killed on Fort Mountain. His friend and neighbor, Bo Salmon, was one of the last people to see him alive.

(Photo: Polaraoid of Henry Ridley Jr., from case file in Murray County Superior Court)

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to our sponsors! 
 
Save an additional 15% off your first order at www.framebridge.com/undisclosed.

Get your first three meals free by going to www.blueapron.com/undisclosed today!

#undisclosed #garymitchumreeves
